name: LowRez Portal
description:
A game for the "Lowrez game jam 2021" !

Its grandly inspired from Portal (Valve) and Portal Prelude (portalprelude.com/)

There is a lot of bugs, i dont had a lot of time doing this game .. :/ but have fun ! Maybe later i will update it.

ASSETS USED :

Some assets are from Valve and i do not own it.
Portal Gun model : https://rigmodels.com/model.php?view=Portal_Gun-3d-model__ZHDHH9HOJJBJZ69GLLW1NZ...

Music used that i dont own : Razor Red Noise - Still Alive (rock remix) and TaVeRiC - Still Alive (r&b remix).
